select v.no as no , a.no as account_no , a.name as account_name , v.reg_date as reg_date , i.amount as amount , i.amount_flag as amount_flag , a.parent1 as parent1 , a.parent2 as parent2 , a.parent3 as parent3 , a.parent4 as parent4 , a.parent5 as parent5 from tb_vouchermanager_test as v join tb_item_test as i on v.no = i.voucher_no join tb_account as a on a.no = i.account_no ;
